short_title: Justice for Public Servants Act of 2011
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text: Justice for Public Servants Act of 2011 - Amends the federal criminal code to make the killing of a Member of Congress or an employee of Congress, or the killing or attempted killing of a law enforcement officer, firefighter, or other first responder, an aggravating factor in death penalty determinations.
